Interface UserDao

public interface UserDao
extends BaseDao<User>
The interface for working with database table users

      Updates user password
      Parameters:
      login - String user login
      password - String new password
      Returns:
      boolean true if the password has been updated, else false
      Throws:
      DaoException - if ConnectionPoolException or SQLException occur

    • changeUserStatus

      boolean changeUserStatus​(java.lang.Long id, UserStatus statusFrom, UserStatus statusTo) throws DaoException
      Changes user status
      Parameters:
      id - Long user id
      statusFrom - UserStatus current user status
      statusTo - UserStatus new user status
      Returns:
      boolean true if the user status has been updated, else false
      Throws:
      DaoException - if ConnectionPoolException or SQLException occur
